messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: I strongly believe that local resilience will bring national recovery. Being green is now more important than ever, not only environmentally but economically.

messages.title: THE VIEW FROM HQ
messages.content: Only the Green Party understands the need for an honest, ethical economic and environmental revolution, working with each other, for the benefit of all. Vote for Andrew Stringer on May 6th.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party understands the need for an honest, ethical economic and environmental revolution.

issues.economy: The Green Party understands the need for an honest, ethical economic and environmental revolution.
issues.environment: Being green is now more important than ever, not only environmentally but economically.
issues.governance: For too long we have suffered a top down, take what you're given, pay what you're told system. This can not go on. The Greens believe that power and responsibility must be devolved to the level of government closest to the people.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born and have lived in this constituency all my life. I was the first Green Party District Councillor to be elected in Suffolk, and one of the first Green Party County Councillors.

endorsements.endorser: Caroline Lucas, MEP, Leader of the Green Party
endorsements.endorsement: Only the Green Party understands the need for an honest, ethical economic and environmental revolution, working with each other, for the benefit of all.

images.caption: Andrew Stringer working on a table outside

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by: Palladian Press (Palladian Limited), Unit E, Chandlers Row, Port Lane, Colchester, Essex CO1 2HG. PRINTED ON RECYCLED PAPER.
